name: Ashes of the Singularity
description:
Ashes of the Singularity is a strategy game developed by Stardock Entertainment and Oxide Games. It was originally released in 2015. Stardock Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Ashes of the Singularity is available on PC.
Geoff Knorr, Michael Curran and Richard Gibbs scored the game.
